title: Explore the connection between space of earth, adamah, and the space of people (from fathers) and the root for fathers as wineskin and dead spirits/winds
author: joshualinog
excerpt: Explore the connection between space of earth, adamah, and the space of people (from fathers) and the root for fathers as wineskin and dead spirits/winds
content:
Explore the connection between space of earth, adamah, and the space of people (from fathers) and the root for fathers as wineskin and dead spirits/winds

this is basically like wind and dust/earth, the two formless substances that comprise adam, humanity.
